articles.title: Cork Pfizer plant to produce Covid-19 tablet - BreakingNews.ie
articles.description: Pfizer’s plant in Ringaskiddy, Co Cork, will be used to manufacture the drug which will then go to other plants in Europe for finishing as a tablet, assuming it wins regulatory approval.

Ireland is set to play a key role in delivering Pfizers new Covid-19 tablet.
